exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables a, p, q.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros Q p Hcomb. intros q Hcanon Heqp. induction Hcomb. - constructor. - unfold spminusf. unfold spmultf. apply ConflTop with (p := (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p)) (q := s). + apply H with (q := (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p)). * apply plusP_reduce. * apply reducetop_sp. * apply reduce_mults_invf. * apply H0. * apply H2. + apply H1. + apply H3.
